dct_title_s: South America : oil and gas activity and concession map 2020 / Clarkson Research Services Limited.
dct_description_sm: Depth shown by bathymetric tints. "Map data correct as of May 2020" Includes statistical tables and charts, list of abbreviations,and advertisements. Insets: A. Trinidad & NE Venezuela -- B. The Guianas -- C. Potiguar Basin -- D. Sergipe-Alagoas Basin -- E. Espirito Santo Basin -- F. Campos Basin -- G. Santos Basin -- H. Magallanes Basin -- I. Falklands. "Base map layers provided by Digital Map Data © (2008) Avenza Systems Inc./XYZ Digital map Company. Bathymetry reproduced from the GEBCO Digital Atlas published by the British Oceanographic Data Centre on behalf of the Intergovernmental Oceanographic Commission (of Unesco) and the International Hydrographic Organization, 2003."
